definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: His daughter, too, spoke with pride at how much he had enjoyed work as well as family life.
sentences.chinese: 他女兒也孤高地談到他是何等地享受事情與家庭餬口。

sentences.english: But it has also demonstrated how clumsy Washington’s hand can be.
sentences.chinese: 但是它也展現了華盛頓之手是何等笨拙。

sentences.english: How precious to me are your thoughts, O God!
sentences.chinese: 神阿，你的意念向我何等寶貴。

sentences.english: I also fully understand how tedious it is to have to look up so many words.
sentences.chinese: 我也純粹理解要查恁地多單詞有何等寡味。

sentences.english: What depths of anguish do they intimate?
sentences.chinese: 它們暗示了痛苦的何等深度？

sentences.english: But Gehazi's actions also illustrate how easily sin multiplies.
sentences.chinese: 從基哈西的行爲，可見罪惡是何等容易蔓延。

sentences.english: This is an example of karmic retribution and how inescapable it is.
sentences.chinese: 你們看因果報應何等不爽。

sentences.english: A man finds joy in giving an apt reply- and how good is a timely word!
sentences.chinese: 口善應對，自覺喜樂，話合其時，何等美好。

sentences.english: How precious did that grace appear, The hour I first believed.
sentences.chinese: 初信之時，我蒙恩許慰，真是何等寶貴。

sentences.english: What a field this opens for us in the inner chamber.
sentences.chinese: 神在內室中爲我們所開啓的是何等的境界。

sentences.english: What kind of house will you build for me? says the Lord. Or where will my resting place be?
sentences.chinese: 你們要爲我造何等的殿宇，那裏是我安息的地方呢。

sentences.english: Yet another study is exposing the horrid treatment of workers by the all-powerful meat industry.
sentences.chinese: 又一項研究揭露全能的肉類產業對待工人是何等恐怖。

sentences.english: Dancing with a paper umbrella, how is she moving?
sentences.chinese: 與紙傘共舞時，她是何等動人？

sentences.english: Say to God, 'How awesome are your deeds!
sentences.chinese: 當對神說，你的作爲何等可畏。

sentences.english: Facing the death, he has a good laugh, this is the what kind dauntless spirit.
sentences.chinese: 面對死亡，他仰天大笑，這是何等的大無畏精神。

sentences.english: We all realize how vital it is to develop education.
sentences.chinese: 我們都意識輊發展教育是何等的重要。

definition: in the extreme (idiom)/incapable of further increase
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique
